basics.name: Marco urrea
basics.label: Software
basics.summary: Marco lives in Monterrey. His work mostly focuses on cloud computing; among his other interests are martial arts, strength training and traveling.

highlights: Automation Lead Engineer in client account; summary of activities:
SAP GUI Automation on C#, Automation of several transactions and several reports by comparing data against given metrics
Heavy automation of processes on Service Now and other websites using Selenium
Generated several Excel reports using EPPLUS and Microsoft Office interop Library for the automation of processes
Design of algorithms and application architecture for other projects
Client, user and app troubleshooting support and maintenance
Back End Web Development Involving .Net Framework
End-to-end development of several apps on different platforms
Front End Web Development involving HTML5, JavaScript and CSS
PoCs of several libraries and frameworks
Manual Quality Assurance testing of a system for a home improvement supplies retailing company
Programmed a semaphore on C# for a factory
UI usability tests of a system for a factory
Performed image manipulation to overlap a set of images on Java, resulting in the output being sent to SAP MII
